headline: Kinder Morgan Keeps Outlook Steady, Sees Natural Gas Demand Booming
summary: Despite minor earnings miss, Kinder Morgan remains optimistic on LNG demand and says most project costs are shielded from tariffs

headline: Kinder Morgan Sees Strong Gas Market, Despite Political Noise
summary: Kinder Morgan is undeterred by “perceived ups and downs” in the natural gas market, said Executive Chairman Rich Kinder during the company’s first earnings call of 2025.

raw.headline: Kinder Morgan Sees Strong Gas Market, Despite Political Noise
raw.summary: Kinder Morgan is undeterred by “perceived ups and downs” in the natural gas market, said Executive Chairman Rich Kinder during the company’s first earnings call of 2025.

headline: Kinder Morgan (NYSE:KMI) Reports Q1 Sales Growth But Decline In Net Income
summary: Kinder Morgan (NYSE:KMI) recently announced its first-quarter 2025 earnings report, highlighting a year-over-year sales increase of USD 399 million. Despite the revenue rise, net income saw a 29 million decline, with earnings per share dipping by 1 cent. Over the last week, the company's stock price moved 2.67%, contrasting slightly with the broader market's 3% downturn. While the company's sales growth may have provided some support, overall market conditions, including concerns about...

headline: PBR to Commence Well Decommissioning in Sergipe Basin Offshore Brazil
summary: According to Petrobras, the Arabia I jack-up rig has arrived in Brazil on April 13, 2025, and is on its way to the Guaricema field to commence well decommissioning tasks.

raw.headline: PBR to Commence Well Decommissioning in Sergipe Basin Offshore Brazil
raw.summary: According to Petrobras, the Arabia I jack-up rig has arrived in Brazil on April 13, 2025, and is on its way to the Guaricema field to commence well decommissioning tasks.

headline: Kinder Morgan Bullish on Natural Gas: Time to Bet on AR & RRC?

headline: Kinder Morgan Q1 Earnings Miss Estimates, Revenues Increase Y/Y
summary: KMI Q1 earnings suffer due to a planned facility turnaround and higher operating costs, partly offset by gains in Natural Gas Pipelines, CO2 and Terminals segments.

headline: Kinder Morgan Inc (KMI) Q1 2025 Earnings Call Highlights: Navigating Growth Amid Market Volatility
summary: Kinder Morgan Inc (KMI) reports record natural gas demand and a robust project backlog, while addressing challenges in net income and gathering volumes.
